Package org.gridlab.gat

This package contains classes and interfaces which are used throughout the GAT application API.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
GAT The GAT class is used to create GAT objects.
GATContext An instance of this class is the primary GAT state object.
Preferences An instance of this class represents user preferences for selecting adaptors.
TimePeriod An instance of this class represents a time period.
URI This class implements URIs.
 

Exception Summary
GATInvocationException This exception is thrown when an invocation on a gat object failes.
GATObjectCreationException This exception is throw when the GAT engine cannot instantiate a gat object.
 

Package org.gridlab.gat Description

This package contains classes and interfaces which are used throughout the GAT application API. The most important classes are GATContext and Preferences. An instance of the class GATContext is the primary GAT state object and is used to broker resources on behalf of the user. An instance of the class Preferences represents user preferences and is used to indicate the user's preferences in selecting which adaptors are apropos for the user's needs.
